name: Magus Arena (VGDC Fall-ty Jam 2021)
description:
This is a game created within a 24 hour work period for the Fall-ty Game Jam between 11/6/21 and 11/7/21. Players must defeat waves of enemies to earn points, which they can spend to unlock stat boosts and powerful spells. How long can you survive the onslaught?

How to open: Simply run the executable file.

Music Attribution:

 Chase by Alexander Nakarada | https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com

Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/
